meanings.definition: Bioflavonoids: a group of plant pigments that are responsible for the colors of many fruits and vegetables
meanings.sent1: The bioflavonoids in the apple give it a bright red color.
meanings.sent2: Many fruits rich in bioflavonoids have vibrant hues like oranges and purples.
meanings.sent3: The bioflavonoids in the carrots were having a party, painting everything orange!
meanings.sent4: Her garden looked like a rainbow, thanks to the bioflavonoids in the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The bioflavonoids made the vegetables look like a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: Bioflavonoids: compounds that have antioxidant properties and are believed to have various health benefits
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits rich in bioflavonoids can help protect your body from harm.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend including bioflavonoids in your diet for a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The bioflavonoids in the berries were like tiny superheroes fighting off free radicals.
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared after she started taking bioflavonoids regularly.
meanings.sent5: The bioflavonoids acted like a shield, guarding her health from illnesses.
